alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Tippecanoe; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:26PM EST until February 18 at 1:13PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River, White River, Tippecanoe River, Wildcat Creek, Eel River, East Fork White River, Flatrock River, and Mississinewa River. .Snow melt and rainfall from Wednesday night through today of around an inch and a half to over two and a half inches on frozen or saturated ground is bringing widespread flooding to central Indiana rivers. Moderate to major flooding is expected on the Mississinewa at Ridgeville. Moderate flooding is expected along upper parts of the Wabash from Lafayette through Covington as well as Wildcat Creek, while lowland and minor flooding is currently forecast for other area rivers. Another system early next week could lengthen the amount of time in flood and produce additional rises on area rivers. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this evening or Friday morning. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River AT Oakdale Dam at Lake Freeman near Yeoman. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Thursday the flow was 14600 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 PM EST Thursday was 14600 cfs. - Forecast...The flow will increase to 14790 cfs just after midnight tonight. Flow should decrease below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood flow is 13000 cfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
